content.title: Open Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Repair
content.description: Traditional surgical repair of infrarenal AAA via laparotomy, interposition grafting, and exclusion of the aneurysm sac.

approach_options.transperitoneal: Standard midline or paramedian incision, most common
approach_options.retroperitoneal: Left flank, preferred for hostile abdomen, juxtarenal extension

key_steps: Graft sizing and anastomosis (tube vs bifurcated)

perioperative_considerations.ima_reimplantation: Consider if back-pressure <40mmHg, absent meandering mesenteric
perioperative_considerations.renal_protection: Minimal suprarenal clamp time, cold perfusion if prolonged
